message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be very valuable to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at a price of $10,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 reflects the true value, I'm willing to come down a bit.  How about $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $8,500. Can you consider that?
